verses.roman:
sāta-sampradāye nṛtya kare sāta jana
advaita ācārya, āra prabhu-nityānanda

synonyms: sāta-sampradāye—in the seven groups; nṛtya kare—danced; sāta jana—seven persons; advaita ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; āra—and; prabhu-nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda.
translation: In each of the seven groups was a principal dancer like Advaita Ācārya and Lord Nityānanda.
